vulnerability.name: USN-3956-2
vulnerability.description: USN-3956-1 fixed a vulnerability in Bind. This update provides the corresponding update for Ubuntu 12.04 ESM and Ubuntu 14.04 ESM.  Original advisory details:   It was discovered that Bind incorrectly handled limiting the number of  simultaneous TCP clients. A remote attacker could possibly use this issue  to cause Bind to consume resources, leading to a denial of service.

statements.status_notes: Bind could be made to consume resources if it received specially crafted network traffic. Available with Ubuntu Pro.
